NOW LEASING

Affordable Living in Downtown Chicago.

One-bedroom and two-bedroom apartments are available for qualified low income households at SKY55. Applicants will be accepted and prospective households must pass credit and criminal background screening to be placed on the wait list. Income and program restrictions apply. Admission standards include economic criteria. Persons with disabilities are encouraged to apply. Equal Housing Opportunity provider.
